customer_info.notes: Customer reported intermittent relay switching and high temperature readings

fix_description: Custom relay timing parameters (increased hold time from 5s to 7s)
Adjusted temperature sensor calibration offset by -2.5Â°C
Increased GFCI test timeout from 200ms to 300ms for this hardware batch

prerequisites: Ensure device is connected to power supply
Verify no active charging session is in progress
Have mobile app updated to latest version
installation: 1. Open EVSEPARKER mobile app and connect to your device
3. Enter MAC address AB:CD:EF:12:34:56 when prompted for targeted update
4. Download and install the custom firmware
5. Device will automatically reboot after installation
6. Verify new firmware version shows as 10.2.1-custom-relay-fix

Run a full charging cycle to verify all functions work correctly
